trans-unit.source: Represents a group of changes to the editing store.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en gruppe av endringene til butikken for redigering.

trans-unit.source: Change groups are transactional.
trans-unit.target: Endre grupper er transaksjonskø.

trans-unit.source: The changes made under an editing scope can be committed or aborted as a unit.
trans-unit.target: Endringer under et redigering omfang kan iverksatt eller avbrutt som en enhet.

trans-unit.source: When an editing scope is committed, the editing store takes all changes that occurred within it and applies them to the model.
trans-unit.target: Når et redigering omfang er utført, tar redigering butikken alle endringer som har oppstått i den og gjelder dem til modellen.

trans-unit.source: If the editing scope’s <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Revert%2A> method is called, or the editing scope is disposed of before <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Complete%2A> is called, the editing scope will instead reverse the changes made to the underlying objects, reapplying state from the editing store.
trans-unit.target: Hvis redigering omfanget <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Revert%2A>-metoden eller redigering omfanget er fjernet av før <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Complete%2A>kalles redigering omfang i stedet vil reversere endringer for underliggende objekter utføre tilstand fra redigering store.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Complete%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Revert%2A>

trans-unit.source: This provides a solid basis for an undo mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Dette gir en fylt basis for en Angre mekanisme.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.OnComplete*> should be called, or whether the change should instead be reverted.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.OnComplete*>må kalles, eller om endringen må i stedet tilbakestilles.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.OnComplete*>

trans-unit.source: Reasons for reverting might include a file cannot be checked out of a source control system for modification.
trans-unit.target: Årsaker til tilbakestiller kan inneholde en fil ikke kan kontrolleres av kontrollen kildesystemet for redigering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if completion can occur; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the change should instead revert.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis fullføring kan oppstå; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis endringen i stedet må gjenopprette.

trans-unit.source: Completes the editing scope by calling the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.OnComplete*> method.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører redigering omfanget ved å kalle den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.OnComplete*>metoden.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.OnComplete*>

trans-unit.source: The editing scope has already been reverted or completed.
trans-unit.target: Redigering omfanget er allerede gjenopprettet eller fullført.

trans-unit.source: Describes the group of changes.
trans-unit.target: Beskriver gruppen med endringer.

trans-unit.source: It can be changed anytime before the changes are committed.
trans-unit.target: Det kan endres når som helst før endringene trer i kraft.

trans-unit.source: Returnsa <xref:System.String> that describes the changes.
trans-unit.target: Returnsa <xref:System.String>som beskriver endringene.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Disposes of this object by aborting changes unless the editing scope has already been completed or reverted.
trans-unit.target: Disposes for dette objektet av avbryter endringer hvis redigering området er allerede fullført eller tilbakestilt.

trans-unit.source: If either the editing scope has completed or it has been reverted previously, then calling this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis redigering omfanget er fullført, eller den er tilbakestilt tidligere, støtter kaller denne metoden ingenting.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Dispose%2A> with the input parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Dispose%2A>med inndataparameter satt til `true`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Disposes of this object by aborting changes.
trans-unit.target: Disposes for dette objektet av avbryter endringer.

trans-unit.source: Calls <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Revert%2A> if `disposing` is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Revert%2A>Hvis `disposing` er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Revert%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the changes should be reverted as part of an undo operation or because the object is being finalized.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om endringene skal tilbakestilles som en del av en angre-operasjonen, eller fordi objektet er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Performs the actual complete of the editing scope.
trans-unit.target: Utfører de faktiske fullført redigering omfanget.

trans-unit.source: Handles an exception.
trans-unit.target: Behandler et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Complete%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Revert%2A> methods call this method to handle exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Complete%2A>og <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Revert%2A>metoder kalle denne metoden til å behandle unntak.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Revert%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.Complete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exception to handle.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket til å håndtere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis unntaket håndteres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs the actual revert of the editing scope.
trans-unit.target: Utfører de faktiske revert redigering omfanget.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the abort is occurring because the object is being finalized.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om avbruddet skjer fordi objektet er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Some undo systems might attempt to abort in this case, while others might abandon the change and record it as a reactive undo operation.
trans-unit.target: Noen Angre systemer kan forsøk på å avbryte i dette tilfellet mens andre kan forkaste endringen og registrere den som en reaktiv angre-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Abandons the changes made during the editing scope.
trans-unit.target: Opphever økten endringer under redigering omfanget.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.OnRevert%2A> with the input parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.OnRevert%2A>med inndataparameter satt til `false`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope.OnRevert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The group of changes has already been committed.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen av endringer er allerede lagret.
